readable.title: 114051287_dd85625a04
readable.content: A boy dressed in soccer attire and holding his shoes getting out of a car . A boy in a red soccer strip is holding his boots in his hand whilst stepping out of a car . A boy in glasses is wearing a red shirt . A child getting out of the car wearing soccer shoes . A young boy gets out of the van and prepares his shoes for wear during a soccer game .
